did.unittitle: Confederate Veterans Association of KY, 5th edition

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 27.7 contains two original copies of the 5th edition of the Confederate Veteran Association of Kentucky book containing the constitution, bylaws, and list of membership arranged by counties and camps including the name, rank, residence, and command of every member.
FOlder 27.8 contains photocopies of the book.
